text: An ancient penis worm with rings of sharp teeth has been discovered in the Grand Canyon, dating back to 500 million years ago and serving as a larger ancestor of modern phallic marine worms found on the seabed today.
creator: Marta Abb√†

text:
Sure! Here is a 2-line summary of the article:

The End of Handwriting: Would That Be So Bad? Explores the potential consequences of technology's encroachment on handwriting, including the loss of creativity and individuality in written communication.
creator: Angela Watercutter

text: President Putin has labeled Ukrainian President Zelensky as the West's illegitimate puppet, making it unlikely for Trump to broker a peaceful resolution between the two leaders.
creator: Thomas Grove

text:
Sure! Here is a two-line summary of the article:

Israel is calling up 60,000 reservists for an invasion of Gaza City as more Israelis want the war to end in a deal that will free the remaining hostages held by Hamas. The move comes as tensions between Israel and Hamas continue to escalate.
creator: Anat Peled

text: The West Texas measles outbreak has ended after killing two children in an undervaccinated community. State health officials have confirmed the outbreak's end.
creator: Emily Mullin

text: A.I.-powered travel tools can assist with trip planning and loyalty program optimization, but Google Flights remains a top choice for flight search.
creator: Gabe Castro-Root

text:
Sure! Here is a 2-line summary of the article:

OpenAI employee stock sale would value chatGPT maker at $500 billion. At $500 billion, OpenAI would become the world's most valuable privately held company.
creator: Cade Metz and Natallie Rocha

text: Mark Zuckerberg restructures Meta's AI division amid internal tensions over technology.
creator: Mike Isaac and Eli Tan

text: U.S. Allies Still Waiting for Tariff Relief on Autos and Steel
creator: Jason Douglas

text: U.S. prepared to use air power to support European force in Ukraine, no ground troops.
creator: Lara Seligman

text: The Trump Administration is considering taking a 10% stake in Intel to help the struggling chipmaker and ensure the US retains its leadership in the industry.
creator: Lauren Hirsch and Tripp Mickle

text: A super-energetic neutrino that reached Earth in 2023 has been confirmed to be real, despite initial doubts about measurement errors. Scientists are now trying to determine its origin.
creator: Jorge Garay

text: A 95-year-old former prisoner of war has a final wish to return to North Korea, where he spent seven decades fighting against the regime. Despite living in South Korea for most of his life, he still dreams of returning home to the country he never stopped opposing.
creator: Dasl Yoon

text: The Trump administration has dropped its request for Apple to create a back door for law enforcement organizations in Britain to access customers' data.
creator: Tripp Mickle

text: Smuggling of ants from abroad has increased due to government staffing cuts, with some sellers capitalizing on the US market as a "gold mine."
creator: Kate Knibbs
